decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations, comprising the alterations to the existing single storey rear extension, would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations, comprising the erection of a rear dormer roof extension, would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - INFORMATIVE

Building Regulations 
Please note that this is a certificate of lawful development only and you may also require approval under the Building Regulations, especially for the single storey rear extension. If you are in any doubt about this you can get further information via https://www.merton.gov.uk/planning-and-buildings/building-control  or by emailing building.control@merton.gov.uk.

Condition : 4 - INFORMATIVE

The applicant should be aware that the site may provide a useful habitat for swifts. Swifts are currently in decline in the UK and in order to encourage and improve the conservation of swifts the applicant is advised to consider the installation of swift nesting box/bricks on site.

Condition : 5 - INFORMATIVE (Party Wall Act) - The applicant is advised to check the requirements of the Party Wall Act 1996 relating to work on an existing wall shared with another property, building on the boundary with a neighbouring property, or excavating near a neighbouring building. Further information is available at the following link: 
https://www.gov.uk/party-walls-building-works
description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A REAR DORMER ROOF EXTENSION, THE INSERTION OF 2 X ROOFLIGHTS ON THE ROOF OF THE REAR GROUND FLOOR OUTRIGGER AND THE ALTERATIONS OF THE ROOF FORM OF THE REAR EXTENSION AND A NEW DOOR/WINDOW OPENING ON THE REAR ELEVATION AT GROUND FLOOR LEVEL.
